availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John N. Dorr, Sr. (Caldwell County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Caldwell County, Kentucky, farmer. Native of Geiselberg, Bavaria, Germany. Married to Mary Gregory Dorr in Robeson County, North Carolina, on July 8, 1835. Father of Valentine Dorr, Elizabeth Dorr, John Dorr, Rose Dorr, Richard Dorr, Catherine Dorr, and Ralzmon Dorr. Tailor in Robeson County in 1850. Employed Peter Fetzer as a tailor in Robeson County in 1850. Farmer in Caldwell County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, North Carolina, Robeson County, Southern Division, p. 360B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, Princeton, p. 81.
